name: Spell Parry
summary: You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults.
description:
You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults. You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you until the start of your next turn, as long as you continue to meet the requirements.Spell Parry Leads To...

Preternatural Parry
